meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or derived from resin.
meanings.sent1: The sticky pinecone had a resinous smell.
meanings.sent2: The resinous substance was used to make candles.
meanings.sent3: The artist accidentally spilled resinous paint all over the floor.
meanings.sent4: The resinous texture of the tree sap reminded her of golden honey.
meanings.sent5: The resinous nature of the material made it difficult to remove from her hands.

meanings.sent1: The resinous wood had a strong, distinct scent.
meanings.sent2: The resinous finish on the table made it shine beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The chef mistakenly added resinous flavor to the soup, creating a unique taste.
meanings.sent4: The resinous quality of the varnish protected the wood from water damage.
meanings.sent5: The resinous appearance of the gemstone caught the light in a dazzling way.

meanings.sent1: The resinous mixture hardened into a durable material.
meanings.sent2: The resinous plant exuded a fragrant aroma in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The resinous candy stuck to his teeth, making him laugh.
meanings.sent4: The resinous texture of the fossil preserved it for millions of years.
meanings.sent5: The resinous color of the amber gemstone glowed in the sunlight.
